entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
